response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $15,000. I am offering it to you for $20,000, considering the immediate benefits and long-term advantages it would bring to your business. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 20000}
